name: Todo-list
body:
### My first project with React.js

_Created a simple To-do App which lets you create tasks; you are able to change their state to completed or you can simply delete the task. You can also empty your tasks list_.  

## What I learnt:
 
- Create a project from scratch
- Class components and functional components
- Events and hooks (`useState`)
- Difference between `var`, `let` and `const`
- Truthy expressions
- `Props`- destructuring props, spread operator 
- Render list items, each element with a unique key
- Use of Font awesome 
- `Map` function 
- npm
- Version control: Git
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
